data.description:
Updated with every user suggestion at least twice a week for almost an year, Top Features are:

**3D Coverage Everywhere**

• Almost every recognizable city on earth is available in True 3D, even my tiny town in a poor side of Romania is covered, so you are probably able to visit your own street in 3D

**ChatGPT Integration: The AI companion can**

• Hear, See and Talk in YOUR OWN Language

• Visualize & understand your surroundings to teach facts or information about it

• Teleport you anywhere on earth if asked

• Help with user interface

**Street View**

• Best UNCOMPRESSED 8k Quality on the market, with every street 360 on earth and every panorama taken by people

**Realistic Graphics**

• Real Life Inspired Lighting based on the Customizable Day/Night Cycle

**Multiplayer**

• With friends

**Hand Tracking**

• Fly like a Superhero by pointing your index finger

• Rotate by Steering an Imaginary Steering Wheel

**Terrain Quality**

• EarthQuest's 3D Map Quality can go much further than anything else out there and achieve realistic 3D by pushing the terrain quality to extreme detail with the best possible performance

**Comfort Settings**

• Comfort Options ( Snap Turning / Flight Vignette ) to eliminate Motion Sickness

• Button Remapping ( Flight Controls Range from Simple to Complex Cinematic Flying )

**Google Maps Integration**

• Smart or manual zoom based on altitude

• Paired with the compass feature for body orientation

• Full Google Maps functionality on the Map Window feature

**.. out of space, check "earthquest.site" ..**

changelog.change_log:
-
v33.06 is RELEASED !!

Immersion is a top priority in EarthQuest, so let's go ALL IN !

1. Realistic Sun, Sunrises, and Sunsets !!!

- The sun has been completely revamped for realism !
- Sunsets and Sunrises have been overhauled for realism as well, based on real life visuals !
- The sun will now also get occluded by the clouds, just like in real life !

2. More Quality and Performance feedback to help the user more easily achieve their preferred experience

3. Fixed a Street View problem that turned the Mixed Reality view to black while previously using it

v33.05 now released with some more small performance optimizations, an AI interface improvement, and bug fixes.

- If you already own the AI,  you will no longer need to press "Unlock AI", the button will no longer appear from now on  !

- Fixed a Hand Tracking ( Left Handed Mode ) issue that allowed flight even when the user was about to interact with the menu

v33.04 now released with even more performance optimizations and a BIG new keyboard feature that allows :

- Taking any language and foreign text character as input for teleportation 
( some text characters like Chinese ones won’t appear correctly on the input field due to font limitations but you’ll be able to preview the address separately as you’re writing it )
- Support for multiple coordinate formats  (  44.244167, 7.769444  or  19° 38′ 46.00″ N, 37° 17′ 42.00″ E )
- Taking other copy-paste elements like addresses
- Modifying parts of text ( with cursor )

An one-time pop-up  will appear for everyone explaining how to use it !

v32.50 is OUT IN THE WILD !!

AI. A-I. AI !

The EarthQuest AI is now completely based on the gpt4o infrastructure

- So, that means faster responses, and much smarter AI in every field !!!

- And, if that wasn't good enough.. EVERYONE will now receive DOUBLE the amount of Tokens every few hours !!

Note: the Tokens amount is unlikely to change in the foreseeable future, but may still very slightly change in the future ( less or more ) depending on traffic

v32.00 is LIVE!

For some of you, this update might just be the BEST update EarthQuest ever got. So, prepare!

1. Every single flight functionality has been improved, from hand tracking movement to multi-directional flight movement like on the grip & thumbstick flight inputs:
   - The entire flight system has been reengineered for immersion! The movement should now be much more immersive.
   - Better rotation integration for thumbstick flight input - built for easy mistake-free control, immersion, and a much smoother integration with the flight movement during combined use.
   
Feel free to hop in and see how immersive the new flight movement is!

2. As requested by many of you, you can now navigate a larger distance in Street View at once just by double tapping the right trigger button.

3. Previously switching to Street View during nighttime or morning/sunset would alter its colors to adapt to the environmental light. However, depending on the panorama, this could've easily lowered visibility. This is now fixed.

3.2 The loading time between the panoramas in Street View Continuous Navigation (when holding forward) is now approximately 0.4s faster thanks to the new optimized Street View system.

4. Fixed the issue where the `Return` menu button (the back arrow) wouldn't make a sound when pressed.

5. No more text in the Hub Menu blocking the Earth view!

5.2 The Hub Menu will now automatically start open after the first time you opened it.

6. An "illusion" effect in the Hub Area giving the feeling that the Earth globe clouds appeared underneath the globe's surface has been reported by some of you. The clouds were previously correctly positioned, so the only solution was to slightly increase the distance between the Earth and the clouds, which is what I did in v32. Let me know if the effect is gone or less noticeable!

7. Better 'How to Play' design!

8. Fixed many small bugs and a few that occurred in very specific circumstances.

Many big and small improvements & fixes might have been missed out since they're not 100% worth listing.
